mapper.select: SELECT article.article_id, article.author_id, article.content, article.photo_url, article.anonymity, users.`name`, article.comment_num, article.report_num, article.create_time, article.type, article.ques_id, question.ques_name FROM topic JOIN topic_content ON topic.topic_id = topic_content.topic_id JOIN article ON topic_content.content_id = article.article_id AND topic_content.type = article.type JOIN users ON article.author_id = users.user_id JOIN question ON question.ques_id = article.ques_id WHERE topic.topic_id = #{topicId} ORDER BY article.update_time DESC

SELECT topic.topic_id, topic.topic_name, topic.topic_desc, topic.topic_father_id, topic.photo_url, topic.create_time FROM attention JOIN users ON attention.user_id = users.user_id JOIN topic ON attention.att_id = topic.topic_id WHERE users.user_id = #{userId} and izhihu.attention.type = 5
SELECT * FROM topic ORDER BY rand() LIMIT #{num}
